title: Parliament Hill, Ottawa
content:
Parliament Hill is the iconic seat of Canada's federal government and a must-see historical landmark.

Source: Wikimedia Commons

title: Rideau Canal, Ottawa
content:
The historic Rideau Canal, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, offers scenic views and recreational activities throughout the year.

Source: Wikimedia Commons

title: ByWard Market, Ottawa
content:
ByWard Market is a vibrant neighborhood with a rich mix of food, art, and local culture, perfect for exploring Ottawa's urban life.

Source: Wikimedia Commons

title: National Gallery of Canada
content:
The National Gallery houses an impressive collection of Canadian and international art, set in a striking modern building.

Source: Wikimedia Commons

title: Major's Hill Park, Ottawa
content:
Major's Hill Park is a picturesque green space offering stunning views of Ottawa's landmarks and a tranquil retreat in the city center.

Source: Wikimedia Commons
